HotelElement.Name: Casablanca Hotel by The Library Hotel Collection

Description.Text:
The Casablanca Hotel is proud to be regarded as one of the most popular boutique hotels in New York City, due to its high level of customer satisfaction. The Casablanca is a hidden gem, located just steps away from Times Square.This oasis of luminous Moroccan glamour and hospitality, was inspired by the romance of the movie, "Casablanca" and its cozy warmth is only outshined by its eager to please staff. Guests can escape from the lights and excitement of the city and relax in front of a fireplace at Rick's Cafe, the Casablanca Hotel's welcoming clubroom. Rick's Cafe serves complimentary refreshments 24 hours a day, including deluxe European-style breakfast each morning and wine & cheese receptions every evening from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m. As a guest of the Casablanca Hotel in New York you are welcome to enjoy these complimentary amenities valued at $105 savings per person, or $210 per couple per day. A lavish European style breakfast including pastries, bagels, muffins, fresh fruit, cold and hot cereals, boiled eggs, yogurt, juices, freshly brewed coffee, tea, espresso and cappuccino served daily in Rick's Cafe; The New York Times, the Daily News and the New York Post are also available each morning. (Value $20 per person). Cookies, fresh fruit, coffees and teas throughout the day. (Value $15 per person) Prosecco, fine wines, imported and domestic cheeses, and hors doeuvres each evening from 5 p.m. to 8 p.m. (value $30 per person). Wireless High Speed Internet access throughout the hotel, with a computer for guest use in the Rick's Cafe. (Value $15 per person). Daily passes to the nearby New York Sports Club, which features a full range of cardio and strength-training equipment; aerobic, cycling and body-sculpting classes; and sauna. (Value $25 per person). The Casablanca Hotel is ideal for those who appreciate a cozy romantic ambiance and gracious service. All guestrooms are designed for comfort with meticulous attention to detail. Archways, ceiling fans, ornamental moldings, unique tapestries, paintings and murals are some of the authentic and unique details that grace the Casablanca. Exceptional staff and luxurious amenities are what make the Casablanca Hotel Times Square one of the premier boutique hotels in New York City. The Charming boutique hotel features complimentary high-speed wireless Internet access available throughout the hotel and a computer station is available to guests at no charge in Rick's Cafe. The executive board room at the Casablanca Hotel Times Square seats up to 12 and Tony's Di Napoli restaurant serves some of New York's most delicious Italian cuisine family style as well as offering room service to Casablanca Hotel guests.The hotel provide the amenities like Baby sitting service, Concierge, Conference facilities, Doctor on call, Dry cleaning, Internet access High-Speed, Internet access Wireless, Library, Lift / Elevator, Lobby, Non-smoking rooms, Parking facilities at cost adjacent to hotel, Reception, Room service, Safe deposit box, Smoke-free hotel, Clubroom with free refreshments, Complimentary computer station, Complimentary Breakfast room, Wine and cheese reception and Outdoor courtyard. Note: The hotel offers wine and cheese reception.
Complimentary Breakfast: Monday - Friday 7 am - 10:30 am; Saturday & Sunday 7 am - 11 am Assorted Croissants, Mini-Muffins, Scones, Danishes and Pastries, Bagels with Cream Cheese, Peanut Butter, Preserves and Butter, Fresh Whole Fruit and Fruit Salad, Fresh Orange, Apple and Cranberry Juice, Assorted Cereals, Oatmeal and Yogurts, Hard-boiled Eggs, Coffee and Assorted Teas served in Rick's Cafe.

The Casablanca Hotel is situated in the heart of the Times Square, the Broadway theater district, in the middle of Manhattan's most popular sightseeing attractions, boutiques, restaurants and nightclubs, and is the closest hotel to the New Years Eve ball drop.

Cozy Classic Room with Full bed - The room offers One Full bed along with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathrobe, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, CD player, Ceiling fan, Color TV, DVD player, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Baby cribs available on request, Soundproofed Windows, Work/Dining table, Complimentary bottled Spring Water, Wine and cheese reception evenings from 5pm-8 pm in Ricks Caf, No rollaways are available, Heating, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Mini bar, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Two Line Speaker Phones, TV with 45 premium digital cable channels, Complimentary passes to nearby New York Sports Club, DVD Player and access to free DVD Library, Evening turndown service, Room service, Safe in room, Telephone, Voicemail, CD Player/FM stereo, 24 hour refreshments in Ricks Caf including coffee, tea, cookies and fruit, Bountiful European style breakfast buffet in Ricks Caf.
Deluxe Room with Queen bed - The room offers One Queen bed along with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathrobe, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, CD player, Ceiling fan, Color TV, DVD player, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Baby cribs available on request, Soundproofed Windows, Work/Dining table, Complimentary bottled Spring Water, Wine and cheese reception evenings from 5pm-8 pm in Ricks Caf, No rollaways are available, Heating, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Mini bar, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Two Line Speaker Phones, TV with 45 premium digital cable channels, Complimentary passes to nearby New York Sports Club, DVD Player and access to free DVD Library, Evening turndown service, Room service, Safe in room, Telephone, Voicemail, CD Player/FM stereo, 24 hour refreshments in Ricks Caf including coffee, tea, cookies and fruit, Bountiful European style breakfast buffet in Ricks Caf.
Premium Room with King bed - The room offers One King bed along with Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Bathrobe, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, CD player, Ceiling fan, Color TV, DVD player, Ensuite / Private bathroom, Hairdryer, Baby cribs available on request, Soundproofed Windows, Work/Dining table, Complimentary bottled Spring Water, Wine and cheese reception evenings from 5pm-8 pm in Ricks Caf, No rollaways are available, Heating, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Mini bar, Modem / data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Two Line Speaker Phones, TV with 45 premium digital cable channels, Complimentary passes to nearby New York Sports Club, DVD Player and access to free DVD Library, Evening turndown service, Room service, Safe in room, Telephone, Voicemail, CD Player/FM stereo, 24 hour refreshments in Ricks Caf including coffee, tea, cookies and fruit, and a bountiful European style breakfast buffet.
